answers.answer: How old is she, there are high risk obgyn doctors that work with patients with diabetes, start first with your general doc-either pediatrician or internist, they can direct you. Type 2 may be mild, may be simple diet controlled or if she needs medications they can work closely with her to keep the baby and mom as healthy as possible

question: I have a daughter that is Type 2 Diabetic and just recently learned that she is pregnant, I am in the process of making her an appointment, should I make her one for a regular OBGYN or a Specailist? And also what are the complications of being a Diabetic and being so young?
title: Diabetic Question?
